content.text:
# Someshwar Fort

| locmapin =
| map_caption = Location in Darbhanga, India, Asia
| height = ~880 metres
}}
Someshwar Fort is the highest peak in Bihar, India. It is a part of the Someshwar Range, and is situated in the district of West Champaran. It has an elevation about . The fort itself is a ruin.
